name: Ball Go Broom
description:
It's pretty simple - you play as a ball and you go broom!

Use 'a' or 'd' or the left and right arrow keys to move left and right

We have 5 unique levels, and an infinite mode!

After beating a level, you earn an amount of coins based on the level you beat (level 1 = 10 coins, level 2 = 20 coins, and so on).

You can change the colour of the ball by buying new colours from the shop
